statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ThicknessTest WHERE PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ThicknessTest WHERE PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #value# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ThicknessTest WHERE InsertTime < #InsertDate# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ThicknessTest WHERE InsertTime > #InsertDate# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ThicknessTest WHERE PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #value#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ThicknessTest WHERE InsertTime < #InsertTime# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ThicknessTest WHERE InsertTime > #InsertTime# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT * FROM ThicknessTest WHERE ThicknessTestDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId = #PCPGOnlineCheckDetailId#
select case when exists( select * from [dbo].[ThicknessTest] where manualId = #ManualId# and ThicknessTestId <> #ThicknessTestId# ) then 1 else 0 end
